methods.Object array(): Returns the array that backs this buffer (optional operation).
methods.int arrayOffset(): Returns the offset within this buffer's backing array of the first element of the buffer (optional operation).
methods.boolean hasArray(): Tells whether or not this buffer is backed by an accessible array.
methods.boolean hasRemaining(): Tells whether there are any elements between the current position and the limit.
methods.boolean isDirect(): Tells whether or not this buffer is direct.
methods.boolean isReadOnly(): Tells whether or not this buffer is read-only.
methods.Buffer mark(): Sets this buffer's mark at its position.
methods.int remaining(): Returns the number of elements between the current position and the limit.
methods.Buffer reset(): Resets this buffer's position to the previously-marked position.
